L'Echo du Bois

Built in 2020

https://lechodubois.ch/
HTML CSS SEO Sharp PHP JavaScript

TL ; DR

I designed and built this website for a woodworker working around Bulle. A particular attention has been paid on responsive design and SEO. The images are optimized using a Sharp script who automatically creates multiple image sizes and save them in both .jpg and .webm.
